ItemDescription.SourceString: Hitting an enemy applies a charge. Building up to 5 charges or switching targets detonates the charges, dealing 100% of weapon damage to the target and nearby enemies. Each charge increases the radius, up to a max of 0.75 tiles.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Hitting an enemy applies a charge. Building up to 5 charges or switching targets detonates the charges, dealing 100% of weapon damage to the target and nearby enemies. Each charge increases the radius, up to a max of 0.75 tiles.
